title: The Kinks and Power Chords
description: A quick, practical guide to The Kinks and Power Chords.

hook.text: Dave Davies slashed his amp speaker with a razor blade â€” and invented a new sound.

buildup.text: The damaged speaker distorted the guitar tone on You Really Got Me in 1964.

discovery.text: That crunchy, aggressive guitar riff became the blueprint for power chords.

twist.text: The Kinks were banned from touring America for four years after a promoter dispute.

climax.text: Without that ban, punk and heavy metal might never have cited them as inspiration.

punchline.text: A razor blade and a broken amp changed rock forever.
